Ad Text:
Cloud & Infrastructure Engineer
Sydney CBD | Permanent

Join a high-performing, agile MSP in Sydney where you'll deliver end-to-end projects, work across hybrid and cloud environments, and have genuine influence over the solutions you design and implement.
This is a role for an engineer who enjoys ownership from initial design through to delivery and wants to continue building depth across Azure, security and modern infrastructure.
You'll be part of a collaborative team led by a manager who is invested in upskilling and developing their team.

Responsibilities include:


Work across a mix of project delivery, BAU and security & compliance, with the majority of your time focused on project work
Engage directly with clients to design and deliver practical, fit-for-purpose solutions
Take ownership of projects end-to-end, maintaining clear documentation in line with ITIL processes
Design, implement and support solutions across Azure, networking, Windows, M365 and security
Contribute to security and compliance activities across client environments
Act as a senior technical escalation point and support the wider engineering team

Experience required:


4+ years' experience supporting, desiging and developing hybrid and cloud environments
Previous experience deploying Azure Virtual Desktops and have implemented solutions on the Azure platform
Able to articulate and position solutions appropriately to clients
Proficiency in IaC tools (Terraform, Bicep) and scripting (PowerShell, Python)
Comfortable working to KPIs and billing time against project work
Solid server and networking background
Strong appreciation for security and compliance, with hands-on experience highly regarded

If this role aligns with your experience and career goals, I'd like to hear from you. Apply now or contact me for a confidential discussion.
